sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-navbar toggleable="lg" type="dark" variant="info">
    <b-navbar-toggle target="nav-collapse"></b-navbar-toggle>

    <b-collapse id="nav-collapse" is-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav>
        <b-nav-item router-link :to="{ name: 'main' }">Recipes</b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item router-link :to="{ name: 'search' }">Search</b-nav-item>
      </b-navbar-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto" v-if="!$cookies.get('session')">
        <b-navbar-brand>Guest:</b-navbar-brand>
        <b-button
          variant="outline-light"
          class="mb-2"
          router-link
          :to="{ name: 'register' }"
        >
          <b-icon icon="person-plus" aria-hidden="true"></b-icon>Register
        </b-button>
        <b-nav-item />
        <b-button
          variant="outline-light"
          class="mb-2"
          router-link
          :to="{ name: 'login' }"
        >
          <b-icon icon="person-fill" aria-hidden="true"></b-icon>Login
        </b-button>
      </b-navbar-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto" v-else>
        <!-- AVATAR -->
        <b-avatar :src="photoLink" v-if="photoLink"></b-avatar>
        <b-navbar-brand>{{ $root.store.username }}:</b-navbar-brand>
        <b-nav-item router-link :to="{ name: 'favorite' }"
          >Favorites</b-nav-item
        >
        <b-nav-item router-link :to="{ name: 'personal-recipes' }"
          >My recipes</b-nav-item
        >
        <b-nav-item router-link :to="{ name: 'family-recipes' }"
          >Family recipes</b-nav-item
        >
        <LogoutButton variant="outline-light" @logoutEvent="refresh" />
      </b-navbar-nav>
    </b-collapse>
  </b-navbar>
</template>

<script>
import LogoutButton from "../components/LogoutButton";

export default {
  name: "NavBar",
  components: {
    LogoutButton,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      photoLink: null,
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.retreivePhotoLink();
  },
  methods: {
    refresh() {
      this.$forceUpdate();
      this.$emit("rerenderLogin");
    },
    async retreivePhotoLink() {
      if ($cookies.get("session")) {
        const response = await this.axios.get(
          `${this.$root.store.baseUrl}/user/photoLink`
        );
        this.photoLink = response.data.photoLink;
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
